markDown.title: Notifiers
markDown.content:
## What is a notifier? Notifiers are unobtrusive messages that provide the user with simple and frequent feedback as a result of the action a user has taken or a system process. These messages should not be critical for the user to read and there should be no action included within them. Informative, Success and Error/Failure are the types of messages that can be displayed as notifiers. --- ## When to use notifiers The notifier can be used for 2 different kinds of messages, Guidance and Alerts. The following are the types of guidance and alert messages that can be a notifier ### Guidance - Communicating information with the user Informative - Gives the user general information as guidance - such as informing them of an enhancement to the product ### Alerts - Inform the user about the outcome of an action - either taken by the user or as a result of a system process Information - Gives the user general information - such as notifying the user of a document ready for review. Success - Notifies the user their action was successful - such as informing the user that their import was successful. Error/Fail - Informs the user of server-side issues or errors that are not at the fault of the user - such as lost internet connection. **_NOTE: Error/Failure notifiers should not be used when the issue is caused by an action the user has taken! These messages should be more prominent such as a well or dialog._** ![types of notifiers](/images/components/notifier/types.svg) --- ## Notifier anatomy Notifiers contain a colored bar and icon to identify what type of message you are sending the user. Each notifier will have a title and short message. Notifiers should be on a timer and disappear on their own, but will still have a dismiss X in the upper right corner. A drop shadow should be applied to signify that the notifier is above all the content in z-space ![notifier anatomy](/images/components/notifier/anatomy.svg)

**Colors** - Success - Green 400 - Informative - Blue 400 - Error - Red 400 ![notifier colors](/images/components/notifier/colors.svg)

**Icons** - 16x16px - A 24px colored circle behind icon (color matches type of notifier) ![notifier icons](/images/components/notifier/icons.svg)

**Container - sizing and spacing** - Container is 400px wide - Min height: 86px | Max height: 126px - Solid white background with a 10px colored bar at the top (The color will match the type of message) - 10px padding from right and left - 20px padding from top and bottom ![sizing and spacing](/images/components/notifier/container.svg)

**Title** - Titles should remain on 1 line - 16px bold ZUI Gray 800

**Message** - Messages support the title and give direction - 14pt, regular, ZUI Gray 800 - No longer than 3 lines. If the message needs to be longer, consider an alternative delivery system (well or dialog). ![notifier message](/images/components/notifier/messages.svg) --- ## Notifer behavior **Dismiss** - Notifiers should disappear on their own after a certain amount of time. - Notifiers will also have an X in the upper right corner that will allow the user to dismiss the message.

**Notifier location** Notifiers appear in the upper right corner of the screen above the content in z-space. ![notifier location](/images/components/notifier/notifier_Location.svg)
